apollo.gui.evidencepanel
Class EvidencePanelContainer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  apollo.gui.evidencepanel.EvidencePanelContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class EvidencePanelContainer
extends javax.swing.JPanel

JPanel that holds evidence panels for all of the szaps/species, handle orientation change. This should be made a singleton. Should this be merged in with CurationManager? Should Species hold the ev panels?

See Also:
